001package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller;
002
003import static android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.R;
004
005import android.app.Dialog;
006import android.content.DialogInterface;
007import android.os.Bundle;
008import android.text.Editable;
009import android.text.TextWatcher;
010import android.util.Log;
011import android.view.LayoutInflater;
012import android.view.View;
013import android.view.ViewGroup;
014import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
015import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
016import androidx.appcompat.app.AlertDialog;
017import androidx.appcompat.app.AlertDialog.Builder;
018import androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment;
019import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
020import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
021import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.databinding.ActivityMainBinding;
022import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.databinding.FragmentEditPresetBinding;
023import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.entity.Preset;
024import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel.PresetViewModel;
025import java.util.regex.Pattern;
026import javax.inject.Inject;
027import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
028
029@AndroidEntryPoint
030public class EditPresetFragment extends DialogFragment {
031  private FragmentEditPresetBinding binding;
032  ActivityMainBinding mainbinding;
033  private AlertDialog dialog;
034  private PresetViewModel viewModel;
035  private Preset preset;
036
037  @NonNull
038  @Override
039  public Dialog onCreateDialog(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
040    binding = FragmentEditPresetBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater(), null, false);
041    mainbinding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater(), null, false);
042    dialog = new Builder(requireContext())
043        .setView(binding.getRoot())
044        .create();
045    viewModel= new ViewModelProvider(this).get(PresetViewModel.class);
046    binding.savebutton.setOnClickListener((v) -> {
047      preset = new Preset();
048      preset.setPresetName(String.valueOf(binding.presetname.getText()));
049    preset.setSpreadRibbonPosition(mainbinding.spreadknob.getValue());
050    preset.setWaveFormSelection(mainbinding.waveformknob.getValue());
051    preset.setFilterPosition(mainbinding.filterknob.getValue());
052    preset.setNoiseAmount(mainbinding.noiseknob.getValue());
053      viewModel.save(preset);
054      /*viewModel.getPresetByName(preset.getPresetName()).observe(this, preset -> {
055        Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), preset.toString());
056        mainbinding.waveformknob.setValue(preset.getWaveFormSelection());
057        mainbinding.spreadknob.setValue(preset.getSpreadKnobPosition());
058          }
059
060      );
061*/
062      dismiss();
063    });
064    return dialog;
065  }
066  @Nullable
067  @Override
068  public View onCreateView(@NonNull @NotNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
069      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
070    return binding.getRoot();
071  }
072  @Override
073  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull @NotNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
074    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
075
076  }
077  @Override
078  public void onDestroyView() {
079    binding = null;
080    super.onDestroyView();
081  }
082}
